com.ibm.jaggr.service.layer

Interface ILayerCache

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable

    public interface ILayerCache
extends Serializable
    Interface for layer cache object

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Removes all layer objects in the cache
      boolean contains(String key)
      Returns true if the layer with the specified key is in the cache
      void dump(Writer writer, Pattern filter)
      Output the cache info to the specified Writer
      ILayer get(String key)
      Returns the layer with the specified key, or null if the layer with the specified key is not in the cache.
      Set<String> getKeys()
      Returns the set of keys associated with entries in the cache
      ILayer getLayer(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Returns a layer object for the specified request.
      void setAggregator(IAggregator aggregator)
      Called for newly created (or de-serialized) caches to set the aggregator instance for this cache.
      int size()
      Returns the number of entries in the layer cache

    • Method Detail

      • getLayer

        ILayer getLayer(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Returns a layer object for the specified request. If a layer is already in the cache that can satisfy the request, it is returned. Otherwise, a new layer is created and added to the cache before returning it.
        Parameters:
        request - the request object
        Returns:
        the layer object

      • get

        ILayer get(String key)
        Returns the layer with the specified key, or null if the layer with the specified key is not in the cache. The cache key for the layer can be determined by calling ILayer.getKey()
        Parameters:
        key - the layer key
        Returns:
        the requested layer or null

      • contains

        boolean contains(String key)
        Returns true if the layer with the specified key is in the cache
        Parameters:
        key - the layer key
        Returns:
        true if the specified layer is in the cache

      • clear

        void clear()
        Removes all layer objects in the cache

      • size

        int size()
        Returns the number of entries in the layer cache
        Returns:
        the number of entries

      • getKeys

        Set<String> getKeys()
        Returns the set of keys associated with entries in the cache
        Returns:
        the key set

      • dump

        void dump(Writer writer,
        Pattern filter)
          throws IOException
        Output the cache info to the specified Writer
        Parameters:
        writer - the target Writer
        filter - Optional filter argument
        Throws:
        IOException

      • setAggregator

        void setAggregator(IAggregator aggregator)
        Called for newly created (or de-serialized) caches to set the aggregator instance for this cache. Note that the aggregator may not be fully initialized at the time that this method is called and some aggregator methods (like IAggregator.getConfig() may return null if called from within this method.
        Parameters:
        aggregator - The aggregator instance for the cache
